0111000000111110 0000010100011110 0 -> sum: 0111010101011100, cout: 0

1010100010101111 0000100011110100 0 -> sum: 1011000110100011, cout: 0
1100111110010011 0111000001000111 1 -> sum: 0011111111011011, cout: 1
0100011110001001 1111010001010010 1 -> sum: 0011101111011100, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
